rules: Type '!random' in chat and the bot will play a random kpoop song in VC. The goal of this game is to be the first person to guess the song name in chat.

actions.name: random
actions.description: Bot plays a random song in VC; type in your guess first to get a point.

actions.name: stop
actions.description: The game will be suspended and the bot will reveal the answer to any ongoing games in session.

actions.name: end
actions.description: Finishes the current game and decides on a winner.

actions.name: help
actions.description: Get help about the game's commands. Add the action as an argument to get information about specific arguments.

arguments.name: action
arguments.description: Any valid command for the KMQ bot

actions.name: cutoff
actions.description: Set a cutoff year for songs. Only songs released during and after the cutoff year will be chosen.

actions.name: limit
actions.description: Set a maximum number of results in the song query. This effectively sets the 'Top X number of songs' based on the selected filters.

arguments.name: limit
arguments.description: The higher the number, popular songs become less frequent.

actions.name: gender
actions.description: Choose the gender of the artists you'd like to hear from.

arguments.name: male|female|coed
arguments.description: To choose between multiple genders, enter each gender separated by a space.

actions.name: skip
actions.description: Vote to skip the current song. A song is skipped when majority of participants vote to skip it.
